mapper.select: SELECT project_no, project_title, project_content, project_pic FROM project_table
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_table(writer_no, organizer_no, project_title, project_content, project_category, project_pic, start_date, end_date) VALUES(#{writerNo}, #{organizerNo}, #{projectTitle}, #{projectContent}, #{projectCategory}, #{projectPic}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM project_participants WHERE project_no = #{projectNo} and participant_no = #{participantNo}
